 2009-04472009-03-26,  ,  TC,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to renew a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PUBLIC SERVICE ALLIANCE OF CANADA for all employees in the National Capital Commission Bargaining Unit. This is a four-year agreement for the period commencing January 1, 2008 and ending on December 31, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
